includeIf.querystring: Select count(ASSET) NBR,STATUS,ORGANISM, MRC, DESCRIPTION from MRQR_ASSETS A where A.ASSET like 'FA0%' GROUP BY ORGANISM, STATUS, MRC limit 50

Select concat('MRN_SPE09#01##',MRC,'#1#',MRC) MRC, concat('MRN_SPE09#06##',ASSET,'#1#',ASSET) ASSET, concat('MRN_SPE01#ASSETA&arg1=',ASSET) ILIAS, concat('MRN_SPE09#05##',NSN,'#1#',NSN) NSN, concat('MRN_SPE01#SPART&arg1=',NSN) ILIAS2, concat('MRN_SPE07#PN',PN,'#',MFR) PN_MFR, if(STATUS='D',concat('MRN_SPE03#07#MRN_SPE10#AS#',STATUS),concat('MRN_SPE10#AS#',STATUS)) STATUS, SERIAL, 1 Pilot, FUNCTION, concat('MRN_SPE06#20#MRN_SPE04#L#',DESCRIPTION) DESCRIPTION, ORGANISM, IFNULL(LIMITATIONS,'MRN_SPE08#white#NO_LIMIT') LIMITATIONS
from MRQR_ASSETS A where A.ASSET like 'FA0%' and if('pSTATUS'='',true,STATUS ='pSTATUS') and if('pMRC'='',true,MRC ='pMRC') and if('pDESCRIPTION'='',true,DESCRIPTION ='pDESCRIPTION') and if('pORGANISM'='',true,ORGANISM ='pORGANISM') limit 100
